languages.text: "Не всякое знание от Омниссии. Некоторое происходит от зла и несет людям лишь угрозу".
"Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Не всякое знание от Омниссии. Некоторое происходит от зла и несет людям лишь угрозу".

traits.locale_text: "Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."
"Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."
"Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."
"Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."
"Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."

languages.text: “并非所有知识都来自欧姆尼塞亚。有的知识滋生于邪恶之中，对人类而言仅仅是威胁而已。”
languages.original_text: "Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “并非所有知识都来自欧姆尼塞亚。有的知识滋生于邪恶之中，对人类而言仅仅是威胁而已。”

languages.text: «No todo el conocimiento viene del Omnissiah. Alguno está arraigado en el mal y es una amenaza para la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «No todo el conocimiento viene del Omnissiah. Alguno está arraigado en el mal y es una amenaza para la Humanidad».

languages.text: 「すべての知識が万機神に由来するものではない。中には悪に根ざし、人類の脅威となるものもある」
languages.original_text: "Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての知識が万機神に由来するものではない。中には悪に根ざし、人類の脅威となるものもある」

languages.text: "Nicht alles Wissen stammt vom Omnissiah. Manches ist im Bösen verwurzelt und nichts als eine Bedrohung für die Menschheit."
languages.original_text: "Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht alles Wissen stammt vom Omnissiah. Manches ist im Bösen verwurzelt und nichts als eine Bedrohung für die Menschheit."

languages.text: « L'Omnimessie n'est pas la source de toutes les connaissances. Certaines sont ancrées dans le mal et menacent l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « L'Omnimessie n'est pas la source de toutes les connaissances. Certaines sont ancrées dans le mal et menacent l'humanité. »

languages.text: "Tüm irfan, Hermesih'ten gelmez. Bazılarının kökü kötülüktür ve İnsanlık için bir tehditten başka bir şey değillerdir."
languages.original_text: "Not all knowledge comes from the Omnissiah. Some is rooted in evil and is nothing but a threat to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm irfan Hermesih'ten gelmez. Bazılarının kökü kötülüktür ve İnsanlık için bir tehditten başka bir şey değillerdir."
